content: उपप्लु {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To float, swim; यदुपप्लवते तल्लघु <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--2@} To overwhelm, cover with; उपप्लुतमघौघेन <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--3@} To assault violently, assail; to trouble, oppress, distress; पौलस्त्योपप्लुता हरिं <ls>R. 10. 5</ls>, <ls n="R.">14. 64</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 118.</ls> {@--4@} To jump or spring upon. {@--5@} To depart from. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To water.
